name: RetroBot
description: RetroBot is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its shiny yellow box and retro console buttons, RetroBot brings a touch of nostalgia to the digital world. Despite its broken screen, RetroBot compensates with its trusty glasses addon, allowing it to visualize and analyze data with precision. RetroBot's arms and legs are designed with a unique hand-down feature, enabling it to interact with physical objects with ease. Equipped with its vintage aesthetics and advanced technological capabilities, RetroBot is ready to conquer the digital realm with style and efficiency.
